dcterms:description: An in-house corpus that contains around ten thousand hours of query utterances for a digital assistant.
dcterms:title: In-house corpus for ASR

dcterms:description: A multimodal dataset containing around ninety hours of synchronized audio-visual speech data, with each utterance having 44.1kHz, 16bps PCM audio, 60 fps RGB, and 30 fps depth streams.
dcterms:title: Multimodal dataset for visual speech synthesis
